description: A humorous take on recovering after a setback.
title: All Right Now
n_1: Sam wakes up in the hospital, realizing part of him is missing.
c1_1: Doc, my left side is gone!
c2_1: Don't worry, you're all right now.
n_2: Trying to process this, Sam starts to panic.
c1_2: How can I be all right when I'm half left?
n_3: Sam struggles with this new reality.
c1_3: This is going to take some getting used to.
c2_3: You'll adapt. Many do with half.
n_4: Eventually, Sam finds humor in his situation.
c1_4: I guess being 'all right' isn't so bad.
c2_4: See? You're getting the hang of it.
